reviews.review: Здесь собираются самые токсичные люди (животные) со всего света. Если Вы очень нежный и ранимый человек, то не рекомендую покупать данную игру: Вы элементарно сохраните нервы.
если у вас нет друзей и вы играете в соло, то скоро вас увезут в дурку

Geri kalan her şey çok güzel planlanmış oyunda. Pingine göre eşleşme sistemi var. Çok pingli isen pingli adam geliyor yada oyun bulman 20 dk'yı buluyor. Sonucunda az ping çok  ve hızlı eşleşme...

БАЛАНС ХУЙНЯ ЁБАННАЯ Я БЛЯТЬ ЗА СУРВА ИГРАЮ ТИМЭЙТЫ 100-300 ЧАСОВ ИГРАЮ ЗА МАНА СУРВЫ 500-1000 ЧАОСВ ЧЁ ЭТО БЛЯТЬ ТАКОЕ?
핵만없음 좋은게임
建议白天玩人，晚上玩屠夫，匹配地快

Ingredientes

1 taza de leche entera.

2 huevos.

1 taza de harina sin polvos de hornear.

Aceite.

Manjar o mermelada.

Canela molida (opcional).

Utensilios

Bowl.

Cucharón.

Sartén de teflón.

Espátula.

Preparación

1. En un bowl se echan los dos huevos con yema y clara. A esto se le agrega la taza de leche, se mezcla todo con la batidora.

2. Cuando se están mezclando hay que agregar de a poquito la taza de harina, sin dejar de batir. La idea es que quede todo homogéneo y sin grumos.

3. Hay que calentar un pequeño chorrito de aceite en el sartén. El aceite debe estar bien esparcido en el recipiente.


4. Luego se toma el cucharón y se le echa la mezcla al sartén. Antes que se endurezca la masa, hay que esparcirla para formar un círculo y se deja tostar por un minuto. Se da vuelta la tortilla y se deja calentar por otro minuto.

5. Más tarde se saca con ayuda de la espátula, se rellena con manjar o mermelada y se esparce en la tortilla y, por último, se enrolla el panqueque y listo.

6. También se le puede espolvorear una pizca de canela molida para darle más sabor.

I like this game because I like to do those generators. Many hate doing them but I find them soothing to do and I especially love it when I start a match with a Hacker on my team and all 5 generators pops immediately. It takes away the one thing that I love doing as a Survivor and I'm left unsatsifed and unhappy.

(10/10) IGN - "Those who plays this game will forget what happiness is and be together with their newfound friend: Depression."

首先，我是一名单边屠夫玩家。有4杀的时候也有4跑的时候，被抓过壮丁也打过萌新。
我不是一个残忍杀手，最后一个人我会背着他去找地窖，但是我也守过尸，因为这个人板后蹲起还闪手电。
60个小时也许在大佬眼里我才入门，但是我还是想给入坑的新手一点建议
1人类玩家不要闪手电嘲讽屠夫，你正常的救队友晃瞎屠夫我们是不会生气的，因为这是游戏的一部分，嘲讽闪手电是一种对对手的不尊重
2屠夫玩家4杀了也可以，不过给对面留点余地，比如放一个可爱的萌新进地窖如何？

Yes, DBD is my favourite game and yes, I am gonna play it for a thousand hours more. But why am I reviewing it as negative then, some may ask? It's kinda easy, but lets start with the game itself.
Dead by Daylight is far, far away from a perfect game and even further from a good game, if u look at the technical side of the previous patch which brought a ton of new bugs into the game, adding them to the pile of smaller bugs which some (!) people recieved during the last months and years cause yeah, the game is bugged. But like I said, only for some people. For me, the game is working good to even very good. According to that, the game is one of a kind (yes, there are some other with simillar mechanics, but this one was first) and its getting tons of new content even after 5 years. There are so many interesting types of gameplay, differencing from killer to killer and many combinations of so called "perks" (which give you advantages) for the survivors. Also, this game makes a lot of fun with friends. But it would be to much to explain because Dead by Daylight is incredible complex and even after 300-400 hours you are still considered a "noob". 

But now its time for the point why I don't say you should play my favourite (!) game: the community. As a veteran, you kinda learned how to deal with it, but for beginners, it can be quite nervewracking. A lot of people think its the "best way" to play to game by ruining the fun of the others and make them as mad as possible, to the point where you just give up and give them the satisfaction of being a d*ck yourself. The community is filled with people like this and they are getting more and more by the hour. SO if you think you want to check out the game cause it looks interesting: don't. A lot of players nowadays arent even playing for fun anymore, simply because most of the time it DOESN'T make fun. And these kind of people won't change. Do yourself a favour, and don't start playing DBD in 2021 if u can't handle bullshit most of the time.

The game is good, but the devs are obviously sacrificing quality for more quantity at this point. They keep releasing a new boring ass killer every 3 months to keep people paying. The last couple updates were broken and unbalanced, the game still doesn't have many basic features and accessability options and the devs are still monetizing every aspect of it.

Also, the game is p2w at this point since you need to buy at least a couple dlcs in order to be optimal. Or you can just play 3000 hours to unlock some perks. But hey it's all free, right?

This game is suffering from a lack of competition. By being the only of it's kind it can get away with agressive monetization. I don't know whether you should play it or not but keep these things in mind at least.

사지마세요 기분나쁜게임

✔️Toxic, vocal community
✔️Iffy balancing under the guise that it's a "just for fun" game
✔️Lags, frame drops and crashes
✔️Rushed releases and slow fixing them
✔️Seriously, people in this game are toxic AF if you use certain perks/playstyles that they don't like
✔️Sometimes an old dude touches you everywhere while you're heavily bleeding and coughing



❌Solid amount of content in the base game, expanded by small DLC packs
❌Killers from multiple Horror franchises/universes, but also new creations
❌You get to to be the killer from "Scream" that everyone only knows from "Scary Movie"
❌Engaging gameplay core, wide variety of customization options (albeit very unbalanced)
❌High replayability, comparable to a MOBA
❌Up to 4 person "coop" against a single, human opponent
❌Good character design and catchy theme tunes
❌You get to creepily stare at beautiful women from around a corner and then murder them
❌Your friends will annoy you no matter what they do ingame, because obviously you know better
❌Sometimes you get to be touched by Meg while you're bleeding and coughing

Overall 8/10 game if you remove the human component (everyone who plays it, the people who develop it).

Dead by Daylight - это...
- Когда маньяк с крутыми перками - дно, а выжившим можно.
- Когда снял выжившего с крюка и занял его место.
- Когда каждый думает, что его мнение самое правильное.
- Когда в чате ты узнаешь новые слова, а также новые факты про своих родителей.
- Когда можно поднимать одной левой двух выживших.
- Когда посмотрел пару роликов у стримеров и стал на 1000 часов старше.
- Когда разрабы купаются в репортах как Скрудж в своем золоте.
- Когда ты плохой маньяк в любой ситуации, да и по жизни.
- Когда ты настолько упертый выживший, как и маньяк, что вы оба готовы часами стоять у люка и ждать, чтобы тот сделал первый шаг.
- Когда игру проходишь даже во сне.
- Когда у двух выживших рамсы между собой, а маньяк мешает.
- Когда сломан комп и ты смотришь игру на твиче.
- Когда все изменили с другой игрой, но через месяц вернулись обратно.
- Когда твои напарники ливают через минуту.
- Когда медсестра и доктор взбунтовались работать за 10 тысяч.
